Issue: slow performance of your System during the scan proccess.
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Is happening with all the cases or just this one?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
Solution: increase processor and cooling fan speed for more performance to avoid such a throttling
Step 1: Look the graphics settings and it was set on high performance
Step 10: Ask the customer to try to scan, the PC now do not have the throttling but the images are close to 450 on 1 minute
Step 11: Expand the Thermal Management tab, set Ultra Performance, and set a checkmark near the “Allow Dell Optimizer to synchronize thermal management mode with Windows performance power slider and vice versa”.
Step 12: The images are close to 450 on 1 minute too
Step 13: Disable the AI Scan and try to scan again
Step 14: Now the image are close to 390 on 1 minute.
Step 15: The case is gonna be escalated to 2nd Clinic to continue with the investigation
Step 2: Look on Nvidia control Panel and everything was set as supposed to be
Step 3: Check task manager and found: Base speed: 1.90 Ghz
Step 5: Start a Hardware test to calibrate the scan as it was calibrated 145 days ago
Step 6: All the test pass successfully, look it on the Int Note
Step 7: Ask the customer to try to scan again but the slow performance still
Step 8: And now the CPU down to 0.4 GHz
Step 9: Go to Dell Optimizer app and set it on Ultra Performance
